getUser

public org.json.JSONObject getUser()
Get user account details for a JotForm user.

Returns:
Returns user account type, avatar URL, name, email, website URL and account limits.

getUsage

public org.json.JSONObject getUsage()
Get number of form submissions received this month.

Returns:
Returns number of submissions, number of SSL form submissions, payment form submissions and upload space used by user.

getForms

public org.json.JSONObject getForms()
Get a list of forms for this account

Returns:
Returns basic details such as title of the form, when it was created, number of new and total submissions.

getForms

public org.json.JSONObject getForms(java.lang.String offset,
                                    java.lang.String limit,
                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> filter,
                                    java.lang.String orderBy)
Get a list of forms for this account

Parameters:
offset - Start of each result set for form list.
limit - Number of results in each result set for form list.
filter - Filters the query results to fetch a specific form range.
orderBy - Order results by a form field name.
Returns:
Returns basic details such as title of the form, when it was created, number of new and total submissions.

getSubmissions

public org.json.JSONObject getSubmissions()
Get a list of submissions for this account.

Returns:
Returns basic details such as title of the form, when it was created, number of new and total submissions.

                                          java.lang.String orderBy)

Parameters:
offset - Start of each result set for form list.
limit - Number of results in each result set for form list.
filter - Filters the query results to fetch a specific form range.
orderBy - Order results by a form field name.

getSubUsers

public org.json.JSONObject getSubUsers()
Get a list of sub users for this account.

Returns:
Returns list of forms and form folders with access privileges.

getFolders

public org.json.JSONObject getFolders()
Get a list of form folders for this account.

Returns:
Returns name of the folder and owner of the folder for shared folders.

getReports

public org.json.JSONObject getReports()
List of URLS for reports in this account.

Returns:
Returns reports for all of the forms. ie. Excel, CSV, printable charts, embeddable HTML tables.

getSettings

public org.json.JSONObject getSettings()
Get user's settings for this account.

Returns:
Returns user's time zone and language.

getHistory

public org.json.JSONObject getHistory()
Get user activity log.

Returns:
Returns activity log about things like forms created/modified/deleted, account logins and other operations.

getForm

public org.json.JSONObject getForm(long formID)
Get basic information about a form.

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
Returns:
Returns form ID, status, update and creation dates, submission count etc.

getFormQuestions

public org.json.JSONObject getFormQuestions(long formID)
Get a list of all questions on a form.

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
Returns:
Returns question properties of a form.

getFormQuestion

public org.json.JSONObject getFormQuestion(long formID,
                                           long qid)
Get details about a question

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
qid - Identifier for each question on a form. You can get a list of question IDs from /form/{id}/questions.
Returns:
Returns question properties like required and validation.

getFormSubmissions

public org.json.JSONObject getFormSubmissions(long formID)
List of a form submissions.

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
Returns:
Returns submissions of a specific form.

getFormSubmissions

public org.json.JSONObject getFormSubmissions(long formID,
                                              java.lang.String offset,
                                              java.lang.String limit,
                                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> filter,
                                              java.lang.String orderBy)
List of a form submissions.

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
offset - Start of each result set for form list.
limit - Number of results in each result set for form list.
filter - Filters the query results to fetch a specific form range.
orderBy - Order results by a form field name.
Returns:
Returns submissions of a specific form.

createFormSubmissions

public org.json.JSONObject createFormSubmissions(long formID,
                                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> submission)
Submit data to this form using the API.

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
submission - Submission data with question IDs.
Returns:
Returns posted submission ID and URL.

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
Returns:
Returns uploaded file information and URLs on a specific form.

getFormWebhooks

Get list of webhooks for a form

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
Returns:
Returns list of webhooks for a specific form.

createFormWebhook

public org.json.JSONObject createFormWebhook(long formID,
                                             java.lang.String webhookURL)
Add a new webhook

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
webhookURL - Webhook URL is where form data will be posted when form is submitted.
Returns:
Returns list of webhooks for a specific form.

getSubmission

public org.json.JSONObject getSubmission(long sid)
Get submission data

Parameters:
sid - You can get submission IDs when you call /form/{id}/submissions.
Returns:
Returns information and answers of a specific submission.

getReport

Get report details

Parameters:
reportID - You can get a list of reports from /user/reports.
Returns:
Returns properties of a speceific report like fields and status.

getFolder

public org.json.JSONObject getFolder(long folderID)
Get folder details

Parameters:
folderID - You can get a list of folders from /user/folders.
Returns:
Returns a list of forms in a folder, and other details about the form such as folder color.

getFormProperties

public org.json.JSONObject getFormProperties(long formID)
Get a list of all properties on a form.

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
Returns:
Returns form properties like width, expiration date, style etc.

getFormProperty

public org.json.JSONObject getFormProperty(long formID,
                                           java.lang.String propertyKey)
Get a specific property of the form.

Parameters:
formID - Form ID is the numbers you see on a form URL. You can get form IDs when you call /user/forms.
propertyKey - You can get property keys when you call /form/{id}/properties.
Returns:
Returns given property key value.

Parameters:
sid - You can get submission IDs when you call /user/submissions.
Returns:
Returns status of request.

Parameters:
sid - You can get submission IDs when you call /form/{id}/submissions.
submission - New submission data with question IDs.
Returns:
Returns status of request.

deleteFormQuestion

Parameters:

qid - Identifier for each question on a form. You can get a list of question IDs from /form/{id}/questions.
